name: is
trans: v.be verb present tense 3rd person singular

name: pardon
trans: int. Excuse me, please say it again

name: am
trans: v.be verb present tense 1st person singular

name: boil
trans: v. Bring to a boil, turn on

name: home
trans: n. Home ad. At home, at home

name: change
trans: n. Change, the money I was given

name: better
trans: a. Comparative grade of the adjective well

name: last
trans: a. The last one, the previous one

name: phrasebook
trans: n. Phrase manual, glossary of common words]

name: madam
trans: Mrs. N., Mrs. (honorific title for women)

name: less
trans: a. (Comparative grade of Little) Fewer schools, smaller

name: most
trans: a. (the highest level of many, many) the most

name: least
trans: a. (Little's highest level) The smallest, the least

name: best
trans: a. (the best of good) the best

name: asleep
trans: a. Sleep, fall asleep (used as an expression)

name: beard
trans: n. Beard (on the chin), full beard

name: nuisance
trans: n. Something or person you hate

name: darling
trans: n. Dear (used as an indicative title)

name: prosecute
trans: v. Dispose of in accordance with law
